pgrid.core.maintenance
Class MaintenanceManager

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.util.WorkerThread
      pgrid.core.maintenance.MaintenanceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, StorageListener
public class MaintenanceManager
extends WorkerThread
implements StorageListener

This class manages all maintenance tasks of P-Grid.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt
